==Walkthrough==
# Enter the Domain
# Approach Lisa and obtain her as a trial character
# Continue ahead and then turn to the left
#* To the right of the staircase is a Common Chest hidden by wooden crates in an enclosed space.
# Use the wind current to glide to the next room
#* At the right side of the room is a Common Chest hidden behind a bunch of wooden crates.
# Activate the Door of Resurrection
# Interact with the console to open the door
# Defeat opponent {{Enemy List|Pyro Slime*1}}
# Proceed to the next room and activate the Electro Monument with an Electro Skill
# Defeat opponents within 20 seconds
#* Defeat the opponents by holding Lisa's Elemental Skill. {{Enemy List|Pyro Slime*4}}
#* A Common Chest will unlock after defeating opponents
#* Another Common Chest is located at the bottom-left corner of the room.
# Proceed to the next room and defeat opponents {{Enemy List|Hilichurl Fighter;Hilichurl Shooter*3}}
#* A Common Chest will unlock after defeating the opponents.
# Use the wind current to glide to the next room
# Unlock the Door of Resurrection and head to the next room
#* Across the Door of Resurrection is a Common Chest hidden behind wooden crates.
# Defeat opponents {{Enemy List|Large Hydro Slime/Title: Rolling Elemental}} {{Enemy List|Hilichurl Shooter*3}}
# Cross the moving platforms; activate the mechanism to form a path
# Use the wind current to glide to the next platform
# Activate the Door of Resurrection
# Break the green stone at the center of the room
#* One [[Anemoculus]] will be added to your inventory.
#* A Precious Chest will appear after destroying Stormterror's crystal.
# Leave Domain
